comments:
This is reproducible on my machine, Eclipse 2.0.1 and CDT GA 1.0.
I go to the Launch Configuration, select C/C++ Application and press the "New" 
button.
I see some widgets flash by to the right, but then the main part of the dialog 
goes blank again. The .metadata/log contains the following:

I have never been able to reproduce this here.  Ensure that 
all cdt plugins are installed correctly.
Sorry, it was my fault. I had old versions of the CDT installed in parallel.
